alfredsnippet.snippet:
Hi <name>, I hope your week is going well so far! 

I've officially launced a new business providing <solution> for <niche> and I wondered if you could help me spread the word. Can you think of anyone in your circle that might benefit from this? Since I'm just getting started, I'd be happy to offer some "foot in the door" pricing to these folks. 

I know it is a busy time for everyone right now, so I'd really appreciate any connections you would be able to make! I've attached my portfolio below as well. 

All the best,
Harley Wilson
alfredsnippet.name: Outreach Email Template
